title: Togo, with FAO Support, Holds Consultations on 2026-2030 Transhumance Strategy
description:
News

Togo reviews 2026-2030 transhumance plan amid rising pastoral challenges

Workshops in Dapaong, Tsévié address land use, climate, and farmer-herder tensions

FAO-backed plan aims to ensure peaceful, sustainable pastoralism nationwide

title: Togo’s Business Chamber Seeks Greater IMF Backing for Private Sector
description:
News

CCI-Togo urges IMF to channel more funding toward private sector growth

Talks reviewed chamber-led projects aligned with national economic priorities

Togo benefits from $400M IMF program supporting reforms and fiscal stability

title: India's GDP growth to moderate at 6.7 per cent in Q1 FY25 amid industry downturn: Union Bank
description: Ahead of the official release of the first quarter GDP growth numbers for FY25 on August 30, a report by the Union Bank suggests the GDP rate to be moderated at around 6.7 per cent. The Gross Value Added (GVA) growth for the same period is likely to settle at around 5.8 per cent as against 6.3 per c...
